name: Truck Driving: Offroad 4x4
description:
You have never experience the off road 4X4 Heavy trucks in your life. So here is the game for you. In this game you drive the heavy 4x4 truck and jeeps on off road Environment. All the off road 4X4 trucks are new and high speed. So test your all driving skills in this new game

Features of Truck Driving: Offroad 4x4:
- Realistic Environment.
- Beautiful and High Quality Grahpics.
- 4X4 Offroad beautiful truck.
- Great Sound Quality.
- All type of control.
